summary: Canary Alfa Batch Production (1-2 batches) with real exports, checksums, and rollback plan.

directives.details: Produce 1-2 Alfa batches with telemetry enabled; record build_info (commit, params, timestamp).
Emit composite_export.json and composite_export.csv; include build_info.json and SHA256 checksums alongside artifacts.
Document export retention window and a rollback plan for canary batches (delete artifacts + revert toggles).
Submit acknowledgement and a factory report summarizing artifacts, checksums, and rollback to exchange/reports/inbox/order-2025-10-15-014-report.json.
